definition[0]: willing to obey or to agree to other peopleâ€™s wishes and demands
example[0]: For years I had tried to be a compliant and dutiful wife.
definition[1]: made or done according to particular rules or standards
example[1]: Future versions will be fully compliant with the industry standard.
definition[2]: if something is compliant with a law or rule, it does what the law says it must
example[2]: The Rolls-Royce engines are half as noisy as the other engines, making the planes compliant with the rules on noise levels set by some airports.
